name: Absorber (Muniz, Rundhyl, vehs)
description:
You need to charge your machine as quickly as possible! Be careful though. If the energy is not properly handled, it'll cause damage to the machine.

Thanks to www.alsounddesign.dk for the amazing SoundTrack!

Left-Top Collector - Q

Right-Top Collector - E

Left-Bottom Collector - A

Right-Bottom Collector - D
